name: Eye of the Storm (itch) (monasster)
description:
Controls:

Click - Fly

Space - Poop

Reset - Click Start Game

Programmer : George Piliotis

Artist : Alicia Breinke

Fly your way through the city during the beginning of a devastating storm as Earth's mightiest avian: the pigeon. Try to make it to your nest doing your best to avoid the flying trash. And while you're at it, feel free to poop on the pedestrians below. Pigeons gotta brag about something.
